meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by mastitis.
meanings.sent1: The vet prescribed antibiotics for the mastitic cow.
meanings.sent2: The mastitic udder was swollen and painful.
meanings.sent3: The mastitic cow mooed in discomfort as the farmer approached with the medicine.
meanings.sent4: The mastitic situation in the barn needed immediate attention.
meanings.sent5: The mastitic condition of the cow was evident from the redness and heat in the udder.

meanings.definition: Characterized by inflammation of the mammary gland.
meanings.sent1: The mastitic milk had a different color and consistency.
meanings.sent2: The mastitic mammary gland was tender to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The mastitic cow tried to avoid being milked to ease the discomfort.
meanings.sent4: The mastitic inflammation spread quickly, causing concern among the farmers.
meanings.sent5: The mastitic swelling in the mammary gland was hard to miss.

meanings.definition: Caused by an infection in the udder.
meanings.sent1: The mastitic infection required immediate treatment to prevent spreading.
meanings.sent2: The mastitic udder was warm to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The mastitic cow's milk production decreased due to the infection.
meanings.sent4: The mastitic bacteria thrived in the warm, moist udder environment.
meanings.sent5: The mastitic infection in the udder was a serious concern for the dairy farm.
